name: Pinball Blocks
description:
Hit the balls with the flippers! Move the flippers to hit the balls by tapping right or left and break all the blocks. If you let all balls falls down, Game Over.

Enjoy the game.

Game features.
-Free to play
-Endless gameplay
-Fun, fast physics
-Easy to learn, hard to master
-Global rankings.

If you love the game. Give us your feedback: https://www.facebook.com/tutappgames
